lead_paragraph: While their numbers may be growing, organists worry that a younger generation does not share the desire to preserve their culture and fails to appreciate the craft.

headline.print_headline: Mexico City’s Organ Grinders, Once Beloved, Are Feeling Shunned
headline.main: Mexico City’s Organ Grinders, Once Beloved, Feel Shunned

snippet: While their numbers may be growing, organists worry that a younger generation does not share the desire to preserve their culture and fails to appreciate the craft....
abstract: Mexico City Journal; traditional organ grinders in Mexico City feel financial burden posed by increasing presence of rival street performers and growing indifference to their curious art from city's youth; despite assurances by head of organ players' union that their numbers are strongest in nearly 30 years, many organ grinders say they are struggling.
